src: „Wir haben jetzt 4 Monate alte Mäuse, die Diabetes hatten und jetzt keinen mehr haben“, fügte er hinzu.
mt: “We now have 4-month-old mice that had diabetes and now don’t anymore,” he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, Professor für Medizin an der Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, und Vorsitzender der Abteilung für Klinik und Wissenschaft des Kanadischen Diabetesverbands gab zu bedenken, dass die Forschungsarbeit noch in den Kinderschuhen stecke.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chairman of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that the research was still in its infancy.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Wie einige andere Experten zeigte er sich skeptisch, ob es möglich sei, Diabetes zu heilen, und wies darauf hin, dass die Befunde für Menschen, die bereits unter Typ-1-Diabetes litten, keine Bedeutung hätten.
mt: Like some other experts, he expressed skepticism that it would be possible to cure diabetes, and pointed out that the findings would have no meaning for people who already had type-1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Am Montag gab Sara Danius, Ständige Sekretärin des Literaturnobelpreiskomitees der Schwedischen Akademie in einer Radiosendung auf Sveriges Radio in Schweden bekannt, dass das Komitee seine Bemühungen eingestellt habe, Bob Dylan über seine Ehrung mit dem Literaturnobelpreis für Literator zu informieren, nachdem es nicht gelungen war, ihn persönlich zu erreichen.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, announced in a radio broadcast on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee had abandoned its efforts to inform Bob Dylan of his award of the Nobel Prize in Literature for Literature, after failing to reach him personally.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius sagte: „Im Moment unternehmen wir nichts. Ich habe seinen engsten Mitarbeiter angerufen und ihm E-Mails geschickt und sehr freundliche Antworten erhalten. Das ist vorläufig genug.“
mt: Danius said: "At the moment we are doing nothing. I have called his closest aide and sent him emails and received very friendly replies. That is enough for now."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Rings CEO Jamie Siminoff sagte einmal, dass er das Unternehmen gegründet habe, nachdem er von seiner Garagenwerkstatt aus seine Türklingel nicht hören konnte.
mt: Rings CEO Jamie Siminoff once said he founded the company after he couldn't hear his doorbell from his garage workshop.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Er sagte, dass er eine WLAN-Türklingel gebaut habe.
mt: He said he had built a Wi-Fi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff sagte, die Verkäufe seien nach seinem Auftritt in einer Folge von „Shark Tank“ im Jahre 2013 stark gestiegen, obwohl die Jury der Sendung die Finanzierung seines Start-ups abgelehnt hatte.
mt: Siminoff said sales had risen sharply after his appearance on the show in 2013, even though the show's panel of investors had turned down his start-up's funding.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Ende 2017 trat Siminoff im Teleshopping-Sender QVC auf.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring hat außerdem eine Rechtsstreitigkeit mit der konkurrierenden Sicherheitsfirma ADT Corporation beigelegt.
mt: Ring has also settled a legal dispute with the competing security firm ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Während ein experimenteller Impfstoff in der Lage zu sein scheint, die Ebola-Mortalität zu senken, gibt es bisher keine Medikamente, die als eindeutig zur Behandlung bestehender Infektionen geeignet nachgewiesen wurden.
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to be able to reduce Ebola mortality, there are currently no drugs that have been definitively proven to be effective in treating existing infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Ein Antikörper-Cocktail, ZMapp, erwies sich zunächst als vielversprechend, formelle Studien zeigten jedoch, dass er, was die Verhinderung von Todesfällen anbelangt, weniger Vorteile brachte als erhofft.
mt: An antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially appeared promising, but formal studies showed it did not provide the hoped-for benefits in preventing deaths.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: In der PALM-Studie diente ZMapp als Kontrolle, d.h. die Wissenschaftler verwendeten es als Ausgangsbasis und verglichen die drei anderen Behandlungen damit.
mt: In the PALM study, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning the scientists used it as a baseline and compared the other three treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics unterstützt den Brief des Olympischen Komitees der Vereinigten Staaten und akzeptiert es als absolute Notwendigkeit, dass sich die olympische Familie für ein sicheres Umfeld für alle unsere Sportler einsetzt.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and accepts it as an absolute necessity that our Olympic family advocates for a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Wir stimmen mit der Aussage des USOC überein, dass den Interessen unserer Athleten und Vereine und ihres Sports besser gedient ist, wenn wir innerhalb unserer Organisation sinnvolle Veränderungen vorantreiben, anstatt eine Dezertifizierung vorzunehmen.
mt: We agree with the statement of the USOC that it is in the best interest of our athletes and their teams and their sport to make meaningful changes within our organization rather than to seek decertification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics unterstützt eine unabhängige Untersuchung, die ans Licht bringen könnte, wie Missbrauch in dem Ausmaß, das von den Überlebenden von Lary Nassar so mutig beschrieben wurde, so lange unentdeckt bleiben konnte, und heißt alle notwendigen und angemessenen Veränderungen willkommen.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that could bring to light how abuse on the scale described so bravely by Nassar's survivors could have gone undetected for so long, and welcomes all necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics und das USOC haben das gleiche Ziel - den Turnsport und andere Sportarten für die Athleten so sicher wie möglich zu machen, damit sie ihren Träumen in einer sicheren, positiven und selbstbestimmten Umgebung folgen können.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC share the same goal - to make the sport of gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and self-determined environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Während der 1960er-Jahre arbeitete Brzezinski als Berater für John F. Kennedy sowie anschließend für die Regierung rund um Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: During the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and later to the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Während der Wahlen im Jahre 1976 beriet er Carter in der Außenpolitik und diente dann von 1977 bis 1981 in Nachfolge von Henry Kissinger als als nationaler Sicherheitsberater (NSA).
mt: He advised Carter on foreign policy during the 1976 elections and then served from 1977 to 1981 as national security advisor (NSA) in succession to Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Als nationaler Sicherheitsberater unterstützte er Carter bei der diplomatischen Handhabung von Weltangelegenheiten wie dem Camp-David-Abkommen von 1978, der Normalisierung der Beziehungen zwischen den USA und China Ende der 1970er Jahre, der iranischen Revolution, die zur Geiselkrise im Iran 1979 führte, und der sowjetischen Invasion in Afghanistan 1979.
mt: As national security advisor, he helped Carter manage world affairs such as the Camp David Accords of 1978, the normalization of U.S.–China relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis of 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Der Film mit Ryan Gosling und Emma Stone hat Nominierungen in allen Hauptkategorien erhalten.
mt: The film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone has received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling und Stone wurden als bester Schauspieler beziehungsweise beste Schauspielerin nominiert.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and best actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Weitere Nominierungen gibt es zum Beispiel für den besten Film, die Regie, die Kameraführung, das Kostümbild, den Schnitt, die Original-Filmmusik, das Produktionsdesign, den Tonschnitt, die Tonmischung und das Original-Drehbuch.
mt: Other nominations include best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, editing, original score, production design, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Zwei Lieder aus dem Kinofilm, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) und City of Stars, bekamen Nominierungen für das beste eigenständige Lied. Lionsgate Studio bekam 26 Nominierungen – mehr als jedes andere Filmstudio.
mt: 2 songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate Studio got 26 nominations – more than any other film studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Am späten Sonntag kündigte der Präsident der Vereinigten Staaten, Donald Trump, in einer durch den Pressesekretär verlesenen Erklärung an, dass die US-Truppen Syrien verlassen würden.
mt: On Sunday, the President of the United States, Donald Trump, announced in a statement read by the press secretary that US troops would leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Die Ankündigung erfolgte nach einem Telefongespräch von Trump mit dem türkischen Präsidenten Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after a phone call between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Die Türkei würde die Überwachung gefasster ISIS-Kämpfer durchführen, deren Rückführung, so hieß es in dem Statement, von europäischen Ländern abgelehnt wurde.
mt: Turkey would monitor ISIS fighters in custody, whose return, it was said in the statement, was rejected by European countries.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Dies bestätigt nicht nur, dass zumindest einige Dinosaurier Federn hatten, eine Theorie, die bereits weit verbreitet ist, sondern liefert auch Details, die Fossilien im Allgemeinen nicht liefern können, wie etwa Farbe und dreidimensionale Anordnung.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that has been widely spread, but also provides details that fossils in general cannot provide, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Wissenschaftler sagen, dass das Gefieder dieses Tieres auf der Oberseite kastanienbraun und auf der Unterseite hell- oder carotinoidfarben war.
mt: Scientists say the feathers of this animal were chestnut brown on top and light- or carotinoid-colored on the bottom.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Der Fund gewährt auch Einblicke in die Evolution von Federn bei Vögeln.
mt: The find also sheds light on the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Weil die Dinosaurierfedern keinen gut entwickelten Schaft besitzen, der Rachis genannt wird, aber andere Merkmale von Federn besitzen – Widerhaken und Barbules – schlossen die Forscher daraus, dass die Rachis vermutlich eine spätere evolutionäre Entwicklung war als diese anderen Merkmale.
mt: Because the dinosaur feathers lacked a well-developed shaft, called the rachis, but other features of feathers – barbs and barbules – the researchers concluded that the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development than these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Die Struktur der Federn lässt vermuten, dass sie nicht zum Fliegen,, sondern eher zur Temperaturregulierung oder zum Herzeigen verwendet wurden. Die Forscher vermuteten, dass die Probe, obwohl es sich um den Schwanz eines jungen Dinosauriers handelt, das Gefieder eines Ausgewachsenen zeigt und nicht die Daunen eines Kükens.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers speculated that the specimen, although it is the tail of a juvenile dinosaur, shows the plumage of an adult and not the down of a hatchling.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Die Forscher behaupteten, dass, obwohl dies der Schwanz eines jungen Dinosauriers ist, die Probe das Gefieder eines Erwachsenen und keine Kükendaunen zeigt.
mt: The researchers claimed that, although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen shows adult feathers and not downy plumage.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Eine Autobombe detonierte am Morgen des gestrigen Tages im Polizeipräsidium des türkischen Gaziantep, tötete zwei Polizisten und verwundete über zwanzig weitere Menschen.
mt: A car bomb exploded in the morning of the previous day at the police headquarters of the Turkish Gaziantep, killing two police officers and injuring over twenty other people.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Nach Angaben des Gouverneursbüros handelt es sich bei neunzehn der Verletzten um Polizeibeamte.
mt: 19 of the injured are police officers according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Die Polizei sagte, dass sie einen militanten Anhänger von Daesh (ISIL) hinter dem Angriff vermuten.
mt: Police said they suspect a militant ISIL supporter was behind the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Sie haben herausgefunden, dass die Sonne auf Basis derselben Grundprinzipien funktioniert, wie andere Sterne: Es wurde herausgefunden, dass die Aktivität aller Sterne im System durch ihre Leuchtkraft, Rotation und sonst nichts angetrieben wird.
mt: They have found that the Sun works on the same basic principles as other stars: It has been found that the activity of all stars in the system is driven by their luminosity, rotation, and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Um die Rossby-Zahl eines Sterns zu bestimmen, die mit dem Plasmastrom in Zusammenhang steht, werden die Leuchtkraft und die Rotation gemeinsam einbezogen.
mt: To determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the plasma stream, the luminosity and the rotation are taken together.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Je kleiner die Rossby-Zahl ist, umso weniger aktiv ist der Stern in Bezug auf Umpolungen des Magnetfelds.
mt: The smaller the Rossby number is, the less active the star is in terms of reversals of the magnetic field.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Während der Reise geriet Iwasaki bei vielen Gelegenheiten in Schwierigkeiten.
mt: During the journey, Iwasaki got into trouble at many times.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Er wurde von Piraten ausgeraubt, in Tibet von einem tollwütigen Hund angegriffen, konnte einer Heirat in Nepal entfliehen und wurde in Indien verhaftet.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Der 802.11n-Standard läuft auf den Frequenzen 2,4 Ghz sowie 5,0 Ghz.
mt: 802.11n standard runs on the frequencies 2.4 Ghz and 5.0 Ghz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Dadurch kann er abwärtskompatibel mit 802.11a, 802.11b und 802.11g sein, vorausgesetzt, die Basisstation verfügt über Dual-Radio.
mt: This allows it to be downward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radio.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Die Geschwindigkeit von 802,11 n ist wesentlich schneller als die der Vorgänger, die einen maximalen theoretischen Durchsatz von 600 Mbit/s hatten.
mt: 802.11n's speed is much faster than its predecessors, which had a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, verheiratet und zwei erwachsene Kinder, hat keinen großen Eindruck auf Miller gemacht, dem die Geschichte erzählt wurde.
mt: Duvall, married and two grown children, made no great impression on Miller, who was told the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: "Als er nach einem Kommentar gefragt wurde, sagte Miller: ""Mike spricht sehr viel während der Anhörung ... ich habe mich vorbereitet und konnte daher nicht richtig hören, was er sagte."""
mt: "When asked for a comment, Miller said: ""Mike speaks a lot during the hearing... I prepared myself and could not hear what he said correctly."""
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: „Wir werden uns bemühen, die Kohlendioxidemissionen pro BIP-Einheit bis 2020 gegenüber dem Niveau von 2005 deutlich zu senken“, sagte Hu.
mt: “We will endeavor to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP significantly by 2020 compared with the 2005 level,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Er nannte keine Zahl für die Kürzungen, sondern sagte, sie würden auf der Grundlage der Wirtschaftsleistung Chinas vorgenommen.
mt: He did not give a figure for the cuts, but said they would be based on China's economic performance.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu ermutigte Entwicklungsländer „den alten Weg von erst verschmutzen und hinterher aufzuräumen, zu vermeiden“.
mt: Hu encouraged developing countries to “avoid the old path of first polluting and then cleaning up”.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Er fügte hinzu, dass „sie jedoch nicht dazu aufgefordert werden sollten, Verpflichtungen einzugehen, die über ihren Entwicklungsstand, ihre Verantwortung und ihre Fähigkeiten hinausgehen“.
mt: He added that "they should not, however, be required to enter into commitments that go beyond their level of development, their responsibility and their capabilities".
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Die Studiengruppe zum Irak stellte heute um 12:00 Uhr GMT ihren Bericht vor.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report today at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Er warnt davor, dass niemand garantieren kann, dass irgendeine Vorgehensweise im Irak zu diesem Zeitpunkt die sektiererische Kriegsführung, die wachsende Gewalt oder ein Abgleiten ins Chaos stoppen wird.
mt: He warns that no one can guarantee that any approach in Iraq at this time will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence or a slide into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Der Bericht fängt an mit der Bitte um einen offenen Diskurs und um Konsensbildung in den USA über eine Strategie für den Mittleren Osten.
mt: The report begins with a request for an open discourse and consensus building in the United States over a strategy for the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Der Bericht steht fast jedem Aspekt der gegenwärtigen Politik der Exekutive im Hinblick auf den Irak äußerst kritisch gegenüber und drängt auf einen sofortigen Richtungswechsel.
mt: The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the executive's current policy towards Iraq and urges an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Die erste der 78 Empfehlungen ist, dass eine neue diplomatische Initiative vor Ende dieses Jahres ergriffen werden sollte, um die irakischen Grenzen gegenüber feindlichen Interventionen zu sichern und diplomatische Beziehungen mit seinen Nachbarn wiederherzustellen.
mt: The first of the 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken by the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Die derzeitige Senatorin und argentinische First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner gab gestern Abend in La Plata, einer Stadt 50 Kilometer von Buenos Aires entfernt, ihre Präsidentschaftskandidatur bekannt.
mt: The current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Frau Kirchner kündigte ihre Absicht, als Präsidentin zu kandidieren, im Argentinischen Theater an. Dort begann sie 2005 auch ihre Kampagne für den Senat als Mitglied der Delegation der Provinz Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre. There she also began her campaign for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires delegation in 2005.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "Auslöser der Debatte war eine Kontroverse über die Ausgaben für die Nothilfe und den Wiederaufbau nach dem Hurrikan Katrina, die einige fiskalisch Konservative humorvoll als ""Bushs New Orleans-Deal"" bezeichnet haben. "
mt: "The debate was sparked by a controversy over spending on disaster relief and rebuilding after Hurricane Katrina, which some fiscal conservatives humorously referred to as ""Bush's New Orleans Deal""."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Die Kritik der Liberalen am Wiederaufbauprozess hat sich darauf konzentriert, dass Aufträge für den Wiederaufbau an vermeintliche Insider in Washingtoner vergeben wurden.
mt: The Liberals' criticism of the reconstruction process has focused on the fact that contracts for the reconstruction were awarded to alleged insiders in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Es kamen mehr als vier Millionen Menschen nach Rom, um an der Beerdigung teilzunehmen.
mt: 4 million people came to Rome to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Die Teilnehmerzahl war so groß, dass es nicht allen möglich war, Zugang zur Bestattung auf dem Petersplatz zu erhalten.
mt: The number of participants was so large that it was not possible for all to gain access to the burial on St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Mehrere große Fernsehschirme wurden an verschiedenen Orten in Rom aufgestellt, so dass die Leute die Zeremonie ansehen konnten.
mt: Several large television screens were set up in various places in Rome so that people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: In vielen anderen Städten in Italien und dem Rest der Welt, besonders in Polen, wurden ähnliche Einrichtungen installiert, die von zahlreichen Menschen gesehen wurden.
mt: In many other cities in Italy and the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar facilities were installed, which were seen by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historiker haben die Politik des FBI aus früherer Zeit kritisiert, seine Ressourcen in der Absicht, die Erfolgsquote der Behörde zu steigern, auf einfach zu lösende Fälle, insbesondere auf Fälle von Autodiebstahl, zu konzentrieren.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's policy from earlier times, concentrating its resources on easily solved cases, particularly on cases of car theft, in order to increase the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Der Kongress begann im August 2005 mit der Finanzierung der anti-Obszönitätsinitiative und legte fest, dass das FBI 10 Agenten für die Erwachsenenpornographie einsetzen muss.
mt: The Congress began in August 2005 with the funding of the anti-obscenity initiative and set that the FBI must use 10 agents for adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa erreichte die höchste Punktzahl der Innings, 70 Punkte bei nur 41 Bällen, indem er 11 Vierer und 2 Sechser schlug.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score of the innings, 70 runs off 41 balls, by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Die Schlagmänner der mittleren Reihe, Sachin Tendulkar und Rahul Dravid, zeigten gute Leistungen und erzielten eine Partnerschaft mit 100 Runs.
mt: The middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, showed good performances and scored a partnership of 100 runs.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Doch nach dem Verlust des Tors des Kapitäns erzielte Indien nur 36 Runden und verlor 7 Tore, womit die Innings beendet waren.
mt: But after the loss of the captain's wicket, India scored only 36 runs and lost 7 wickets, ending the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Der US-amerikanische Präsident George W. Bush traf am 16. November morgens in Singapur ein und begann eine einwöchige Reise durch Asien.
mt: 16 November 2006: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore this morning and began a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Er wurde von Wong Kan Seng, dem stellvertretenden Premierminister Singapurs, begrüßt und sprach mit Lee Hsien Loong, dem Premierminister Singapurs, über Handels- und Terrorismusangelegenheiten.
mt: He was greeted by Wong Kan Seng, Singapore's deputy prime minister, and spoke with Lee Hsien Loong, Singapore's prime minister, about trade and terrorism issues.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Nach einer Woche voller Verluste in der Zwischenwahl erzählte Bush dem Publikum von der Ausweitung des Handels in Asien.
mt: After a week of losses in the mid-term elections, Bush told the audience of the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: "Premierminister Stephen Harper hat nach einem 25-minütigen Treffen mit NDP-Leader Jack Layton am Dienstag im PMO zugestimmt, den ""Clean Air Act"" der Regierung an ein Komitee aller Parteien zur Prüfung vor der zweiten Anhörung zu schicken."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the ""Clean Air Act"" to a committee of all parties for review before the second hearing, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP Leader Jack Layton on Tuesday at the PMO."
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton hatte während des Treffens mit dem Premierminister Änderungen am Umweltgesetz der Konservativen gefordert und dabei eine „gründliche und vollständige Neufassung“ des Umweltgesetzes der Konservativen Partei verlangt.
mt: Layton had demanded changes to the Conservative Party's environmental law during the meeting with the Prime Minister and had called for a "thorough and complete re-write" of the Conservative Party's environmental law.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Nachdem die Bundesregierung eingesprungen ist, um die Finanzierung des Mersey-Krankenhauses in Devonport (Tasmanien) zu übernehmen, haben die Landesregierung und einige Parlamentsmitglieder den Vorgang als PR-Gag im Vorfeld der für November anberaumten Bundeswahl kritisiert.
mt: After the federal government stepped in to take over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport (Tasmania), the state government and some parliamentarians have criticized the move as a PR stunt ahead of the federal election scheduled for November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Premierminister John Howard sagte jedoch, die Maßnahme, 45 Millionen australische Dollar bereitzustellen, diene nur dazu, die Krankenhauseinrichtungen vor einer Herabstufung durch die tasmanische Regierung zu bewahren.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard said, however, that the measure, which provides 45 million Australian dollars, is only to preserve the hospital facilities from a downgrade by the Tasmanian government.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Laut dem aktuellen Bulletin deuteten die Messungen des Meeresspiegels darauf hin, dass ein Tsunami ausgelöst wurde. In der Nähe von Pago Pago und Niue wurde eine eindeutige Tsunami-Aktivität aufgezeichnet.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, the sea level measurements indicated that a tsunami was triggered.  A clear tsunami activity was recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Es wurden keine nennenswerten Schäden oder Verletzungen aus Tonga vermeldet. Doch der Strom fiel zeitweise aus, was Berichten zufolge der Grund dafür war, dass die tongaischen Behörden die Tsunami-Warnung des PTWC nicht erhalten hatten.
mt: No significant damage or injuries were reported from Tonga. However, the power went out for a time, which reports say was the reason the Tongan authorities did not receive the PTWC tsunami warning.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Vierzehn Schulen in Hawaii, die an oder in der Nähe von Küsten liegen, waren den ganzen Mittwoch geschlossen, obwohl die Warnungen aufgehoben worden waren.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii, which were near or on the coast, were closed all Wednesday, even though the warnings were lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: U.S.-Präsident George W. Bush begrüßte die Bekanntgabe.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: "Bush-Sprecher Gordon Johndroe nannte das Versprechen Nordkoreas „einen wichtigen Schritt in Richtung des Ziels, die verifizierbare Entnuklearisierung der koreanischen Halbinsel zu erreichen."""
mt: "Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's promise "an important step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula.""
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Der zehnte Sturm der atlantischen Hurrikan-Saison, der einen Namen erhielt, der subtropische Sturm Jerry, ist heute im Atlantischen Ozean entstanden.
mt: 10th storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Das National Hurricane Center (NHC) sagt, dass Jerry zu diesem Zeitpunkt keine Gefahr für die Landung darstellt.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Jerry poses no threat to landfall at this time.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Der US-amerikanische Ingenieurskorps schätzte , dass 6 Zoll Regen die schon zuvor beschädigten Dämme brechen lassen könnten.
mt: The American engineering corps estimated that 6 inches of rain could break the already damaged levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Der Ninth Ward, der während des Hurrikans Katrina bis zu 20 Fuß hoch überflutet war, führt derzeit hüfthohes Wasser, da der nahe gelegene Deich überspült wurde.
mt: The Ninth Ward, which was flooded up to 20 feet high during Hurricane Katrina, is currently carrying knee-deep water, as the nearby levee was breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Auf einem 100 Fuß langen Teilabschnitt läuft Wasser über den Damm.
mt: 30.5 m long section of the dam is leaking.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Der Commons-Administrator Adam Cuerden hat seine Enttäuschung über die Entfernungen zum Ausdruck gebracht, als er im letzten Monat mit Wikinews redete.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his disappointment over the distances when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: """Er [Wales] hat uns im Grunde von Anfang an belogen. Erstens, indem er so tat, als ob dies aus rechtlichen Gründen geschah. Zweitens, indem er so tat, als würde er uns zuhören, bis hin zu seiner Kunstlöschung."""
mt: """He [Wales] has been lying to us from the start. First, by pretending this was done for legal reasons. Second, by pretending to listen to us, all the way to his fake fire extinguisher."""
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Die Irritationen in der Community führten zu den derzeitigen Bemühungen, eine Richtlinie bezüglich sexueller Inhalte für die Website zu entwerfen, die Millionen offen lizenzierter Medien hostet.
mt: The community's irritation led to the current efforts to draft a guideline regarding sexual content for the website that hosts millions of openly licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Die Arbeit war größtenteils theoretischer Natur, doch das Programm wurde geschrieben, um Beobachtungen zu simulieren, die von der Sagittarius-Galaxie gemacht wurden.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Der Effekt, nach dem das Team suchte, würde von Gezeitenkräften zwischen der dunklen Materie der Galaxie und der dunklen Materie der Milchstraße verursacht werden.
mt: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Genau wie der Mond die Erde anzieht und die Gezeiten verursacht, übt auch die Milchstraße Anziehungskräfte auf die Sagittarius-Galaxie aus.
mt: Just as the Moon attracts the Earth and causes tides, so too does the Milky Way exert gravitational forces on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Die Wissenschaftler kamen zu dem Schluss, dass die dunkle Materie auf andere dunkle Materie in der gleichen Weise wirkt wie normale Materie.
mt: The scientists concluded that dark matter acts on other dark matter in the same way as normal matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Diese Theorie besagt, dass sich der größte Teil der dunklen Materie in einer Art Halo um eine Galaxie befindet und aus vielen kleinen Partikeln besteht.
mt: This theory states that most of the dark matter is in a sort of halo around a galaxy and consists of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Fernsehberichte zeigen, dass weißer Rauch aus der Anlage entweicht.
mt: TV reports show white smoke coming from the facility.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Die lokalen Behörden ermahnen die Einwohner in der Nähe der Anlage dazu, sich innerhalb von Gebäuden aufzuhaltem, Klimaanlagen auszuschalten und kein Leitungswasser zu trinken.
mt: Local authorities advise residents near the plant to stay inside buildings, turn off air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Der Nuklearbehörde von Japan zufolge wurden radioaktives Cäsium und Jod im Atomkraftwerk festgestellt.
mt: According to Japan's nuclear authority, radioactive cesium and iodine were found at the nuclear power plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Die Behörden spekulieren, dass dies darauf hindeutet, dass Behälter mit Uran-Kraftstoff am Standort gerissen sein könnten und eventuell undicht sind.
mt: Authorities speculate this may indicate that containers with uranium fuel at the site may have been ripped open and may be leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Die extrem-arzneimittelresistente Tuberkulose (XDR-TB) wurde von Dr. Tony Moll in der südafrikanischen Region KwaZulu-Natal entdeckt.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: "In einem Interview sagte er, die neue Variante sei „äußerst beunruhigend und alarmierend aufgrund der sehr hohen Sterblichkeitsrate."""
mt: "In an interview he said the new variant was "extremely alarming and alarming due to the very high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Einige Patienten haben sich möglicherweise im Krankenhaus mit dem Erreger angesteckt, meint Dr. Moll, und mindestens zwei waren medizinische Krankenhausangestellte.
mt: Some patients may have possibly been infected with the virus at the hospital, says Dr. Moll, and at least two were medical hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
